name: Information Chart of Accounts OS
short_description:
Information Chart of Accounts (ICA) combines IT and Business Management processes as an integrated assembly. ICA is applicable on open source (OS) and commercial (COM).

ICA OS resolves two problems in the market:
1) Removing the gap between business and IT management by creating the common language upon each others
2) Integrating the numerous and various standards and best practices into one manageable and adjustable ensemble

ICA OS has three fundamentals:
1) Clarity
- shared and joint conception based on common IT and business process governance
2) Scalability
- possible to be utilized in big corporations, small companies and public sector in different geographical locations
3) Focus
- right information on right time and place on today's complicated and diversed environment

ICA OS methodology combines methods, processes, tools and applications to the unified solution on open source platform.
summary: Information Chart of Accounts - Open Source
